title: Enterprise asset subtypes workflow
content:
This section describes the metaphases and subordinate phases in the life cycle of enterprise asset subtype.

Metaphase: Draft

Phase Transition Description
Draft Manual

The enterprise asset subtype is in the draft stautus.

Next phase: Active or Retired

Metaphase: Active

Phase Transition Description
Active Manual

The enterprise asset subtype is available for selection.

To make the enterprise asset subtype retired, manually transition it to the Retired phase.

To modify the enterprise asset subtype, manually transition it to the Draft phase.

Next phase: Retired or Draft.

Metaphase: Retired (End)

Phase Transition Description
Retired Manual

The enterprise asset subtype isn't available for selection.

Next phase: None

Related topics

  • Create an enterprise asset subtype
  • Edit an enterprise asset subtype
  • Enterprise asset subtypes
